Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.client

Interface Fido2Client

public interface Fido2Client
A FIDO2 client that processes FIDO2 requests and generates FIDO2 responses.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo>
    authenticatorRegistrations()
    Retrieve a list of registered FIDO2 Authenticators.
    void
    deleteAuthenticatorRegistration(Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo authenticatorRegistration)
    Delete Authenticator registration
    List<Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo>

    Retrieve a list of registered FIDO2 Authenticators for a specified userId.

    getSDKVersion()
    Returns FIDO2 SDK version
    void
    reset()
    Delete all authenticator registrations.

    respondWithArgs(Fido2RespondArgs respondArgs, Fido2ResponseCallback responseCallback)
    Responds asynchronously to a FIDO2 request by generating a FIDO2 response.
    void
    setActivity(androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity activity)
    Sets an optional FragmentActivity used for flows that require UI, such as Biometric, Platform Local and Platform Authenticator

  • Method Details

    • respondWithArgs

      @NonNull Fido2ResponseTask respondWithArgs(Fido2RespondArgs respondArgs, Fido2ResponseCallback responseCallback)
      Responds asynchronously to a FIDO2 request by generating a FIDO2 response. This operation may run for a long period of time and all UI is delegated to the caller.
      Parameters:
      respondArgs - FIDO2 request plus other arguments required to fulfill the request.
      responseCallback - callback to call when the execution is complete.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • authenticatorRegistrations

      @NonNull @WorkerThread List<Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo> authenticatorRegistrations()
      Retrieve a list of registered FIDO2 Authenticators. It is recommended to be called on a background thread.
      Returns:
      An array of Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo representing the registered Authenticators
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getAuthenticatorRegistrations

      @WorkerThread List<Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo> getAuthenticatorRegistrations(String userId)
      Retrieve a list of registered FIDO2 Authenticators for a specified userId. It is recommended to be called on a background thread.
      Parameters:
      userId - The intended userid of the authenticators
      Returns:
      An array of Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo representing the registered Authenticators for particular userId.
      Since:
      1.6.0

    • deleteAuthenticatorRegistration

      void deleteAuthenticatorRegistration(Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo authenticatorRegistration) throws Fido2Exception
      Delete Authenticator registration
      Throws:
      Fido2Exception - Exception when unsafe environment detected.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • reset

      void reset() throws Fido2Exception
      Delete all authenticator registrations. This method will also delete Passcode Authenticator enrollment.
      Throws:
      Fido2Exception - Exception when unsafe environment detected.
      Since:
      1.3.0

    • getSDKVersion

      static String getSDKVersion()
      Returns FIDO2 SDK version
      Returns:
      FIDO2 SDK version
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • setActivity

      void setActivity(@Nullable androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity activity)
      Sets an optional FragmentActivity used for flows that require UI, such as Biometric, Platform Local and Platform Authenticator
      Parameters:
      activity - FragmentActivity to use, or null to unset
      Since:
      4.0.0
